original_text: and that he has brought you near him, and all your brothers the sons of Levi with you? And would you seek the priesthood also?
korean_text: 하나님이 너와 네 모든 형제 레위 자손으로 너와 함께 가까이 오게 하셨거늘 너희가 오히려 제사장의 직분을 구하느냐

sentences.original_text: and that he has brought you near him
and all your brothers the sons of Levi with you?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신과 함께 당신의 모든 형제 레위 자손들까지도?

sentences.original_text: And would you seek the priesthood also?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데도 너희가 제사장 직분을 또 구하려느냐?
